title: Dynamic Union Find Applications
question: In the 'Number of Islands II' problem where land cells are added dynamically, why is Union Find more suitable than a DFS/BFS approach?
options: Union Find efficiently handles incremental changes to the grid and tracks connected components
Union Find requires less memory than running DFS/BFS after each new land cell
Union Find guarantees O(1) time complexity for each new land cell
DFS/BFS cannot identify islands in a grid structure
